name: Red Roof Inn Hilton Head Island

reviews.text: Usually I look at reviews before I stay at a hotel, but I was traveling and didn't have access to a computer. Thank goodness - since I was very pleasantly surprised!
reviews.title: Rating Based on Value!
Don't stay here
reviews.text: Pros: The location - it is in the heart of everything you need on HHI - not far from beaches, restaurants, malls, etc. Safety - I was traveling alone and felt very, very safe. The room and the complex were very quiet. I got a walk in rate of around $45, which was better than anything else in the area for sure. They have free coffee and danishes for breakfast and free newspaper in the morning. I have rarely stayed at a hotel with as many free tv channels - HBO, Showtime, etc. - it surprised me. The service was extra friendly and helpful, and I got a LOT of airline miles with "my" airline for signing up for their program, which encouraged me to stay the next night at another RRI (but in Florida).

reviews.title: Miserable stay.
reviews.text: Cons: It is a motel, so all the doors face outside. I only had one bath towel - I could have asked for another I suppose but I didn't. They don't give free shampoo and they don't have hairdryers. (I wish I knew that in advance). Again, I didn't ask for one but I'm thinking I'd be out of luck on that.

aka: Red Roof Inn Hilton Head Island Hotel Hilton Head
